text:
- Putting machine learning
models into production
can be daunting and complicated.

It's an iterative process
involving thousands of trials

and tuning millions or even
billions of parameters,

which make it difficult to
move fast and ensure quality.

And once the model is created,
the work isn't finished.
It's only getting started,
because as data changes,

the model needs to relearn
and adapt continuously.

Otherwise the predictions
will be inaccurate,
and the model's performance will suffer.

That's where Amazon SageMaker
MLOps tools come in.

Standardized environments
allow you to get started
on your project in minutes, not weeks.

And SageMaker experiments
helps you iterate quickly
while you collaborate,
speeding up the model building process.

There may be hundreds or
even thousands of models
across your organization,
which makes them a challenge to manage.

SageMaker Model Registry
catalogs ML artifacts,

so that they can be centrally
tracked and accessed,
increasing reproducibility and governance.

With SageMaker, you can
integrate CI/CD pipelines

to deploy models alongside
other software applications.

And you'll always have an
eye on changes to the data
and how it impacts your models.

SageMaker Model Monitor
continuously tracks
model performance and data quality

so you can automatically
trigger SageMaker pipelines
to retrain production models,
keeping everything running smoothly
at the highest levels of quality.

Deliver high quality ML
models quickly at scale
with Amazon SageMaker MLOps.
